Description: Total apparent power (in VA) measured at the main meter.
Total real power (in W) measured at the main meter.
Total reactive power (in VAR) measured at the main meter.
Line voltage measured at the main meter (system level).
Ratio of real power to apparent power, indicating efficiency of power usage.
Electrical frequency (in Hz) measured at the main meter.
Total active energy (in Wh) exported from the system to the grid.
Total active energy (in Wh) imported from the grid to the system.
Total reactive energy (in VARh) with inductive characteristic
Total reactive energy (in VARh) with capacitive characteristic

Apparent power (in VA) for phase L2.
Apparent power (in kVA) for phase L3.

Active power (in W) for phase L3.
Reactive power (in VAR) for phase L1.
Reactive power (in VAR) for phase L2.
Reactive power (in VAR) for phase L3.
Voltage between phase L1 and neutral.
Voltage between phase L2 and neutral.
Voltage between phase L3 and neutral.
Voltage between phase L1 and L2.
Voltage between phase L2 and L3.
Voltage between phase L3 and L1.

Current (in A) for phase L3.
